fix(frontend): improve CreateDealModal validation and test stability

Enhanced deal creation form with better validation and more reliable tests.

**Validation Improvements:**
- Added immediate negative value detection for deal_size field
- Validation now triggers on blur with field-specific error handling
- Better UX with instant feedback on invalid input

**Test Improvements:**
- Fixed flaky async tests in CreateDealModal.test.tsx
- Added proper waitFor() for focus assertions
- Fixed submit button disable test with correct mock handling
- Improved test reliability for CI/CD pipeline

**Documentation:**
- Updated bmm-workflow-status.yaml with Session 2025-11-10D progress
- Noted Kanban SLA badges + valuation KPI parity completion

All changes follow TDD methodology and improve code quality.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

feat(deals): add real-time validation on blur for CreateDealModal

Improved form UX by validating fields immediately after blur event instead of
waiting for form submission.

**Change**:
- Added validate() call in handleBlur() after marking field as touched
- Users now see validation errors immediately when they leave a field
- Provides faster feedback for required fields and validation rules

**Benefits**:
- Better UX - instant feedback on field errors
- Reduces form submission failures
- Aligns with modern form best practices
- Complements existing Escape key handler and touch-based validation

**Related**:
- Part of CreateDealModal UX improvements
- Works with existing validation logic and error display

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

docs(testing): add comprehensive Sprint 1A test coverage enhancement plan

Created detailed 50-hour roadmap to achieve 90%+ backend and 70%+ frontend test coverage.

**Sprint 1A Test Coverage Plan**:
- Identified 15 critical test gaps across backend, frontend, and integration
- Prioritized into P0 (32h), P1 (18h), P2 (10h) categories
- Defined 280+ tests to be added over 2-week sprint
- Includes TDD execution templates and commands

**Priority 0 Critical Gaps** (32 hours):
1. Pipeline Template Service (0% coverage) - 12 tests, 4h
2. User Service + Org Auto-Create (untested auth fix) - 12 tests, 4h
3. Document Room Frontend (0% coverage) - 40 tests, 8h
4. Deal Matching Workspace (failing tests) - 25 tests, 6h
5. Invite Service (0% coverage) - 15 tests, 5h
6. Deal Service (no service tests) - 15 tests, 5h

**Priority 1 High Priority** (18 hours):
7. Valuation KPI edge cases - 8 tests, 2h
8. Podcast video upload - 12 tests, 4h
9. Auth E2E flow - 12 tests, 5h
10. Valuation Suite frontend KPIs - 10 tests, 3h
11. Deal Pipeline E2E - 8 tests, 4h

**Priority 2 Medium Priority** (10 hours):
12-15. Task Template, RBAC Audit, Organization, Document Room E2E

**Expected Outcomes**:
- Week 1: +90 tests, Backend 82%â†’87%, Frontend 38%â†’52%
- Week 2: +75 tests, Backend 87%â†’91%, Frontend 52%â†’68%
- Total: +280 tests, 2 E2E suites, 0 P0 gaps

**TDD Methodology**:
- RED â†’ GREEN â†’ REFACTOR workflow enforced
- Test templates provided for backend (pytest) and frontend (Vitest)
- Daily progress tracking in BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md
- Coverage reports required for each PR

**Test File Locations**:
- 8 new backend service test files to create
- 5 new frontend component test files to create
- 3 new E2E integration test suites to create

**Related Work**:
- Addresses 93 Vitest failures noted in BMAD tracker
- Covers recent features: pipeline templates, valuation KPIs, org auto-create
- Prepares for Render deployment verification

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

fix(migrations): remove redundant UUID conversion migrations - users.id and organizations.id already String(36)

Fixed deployment blocker by removing duplicate type conversion migrations.

**Root Cause:**
Migration `36b3e62b4148_add_deals_and_pipeline_stages_tables.py` (early in chain) already:
1. Converts users.id from UUID to String(36) (lines 76-79)
2. Creates organizations table with String(36) ID from the start (lines 23-24)

**Problem:**
Newly created migrations tried to convert these columns again:
- `3a15202c7dc2` - Convert users.id UUID â†’ String (REDUNDANT - already converted)
- `0cbf1e0e3ab5` - Convert organizations.id UUID â†’ String (REDUNDANT - never was UUID)

**Deployment Failures:**
When Alembic ran `upgrade head` from production state (8dcb6880a52b), it would:
1. Run migration `36b3e62b4148` - Convert users.id to String(36) âœ…
2. Later try to run `3a15202c7dc2` - Convert users.id to String(36) again â�Œ
3. PostgreSQL error: Can't convert String to String using `::text` casting

**Fix:**
Removed redundant migrations:
- â�Œ Deleted: 3a15202c7dc2_convert_users_id_from_uuid_to_string_.py
- â�Œ Deleted: 0cbf1e0e3ab5_fix_organizations_id_type_from_uuid_to_.py
- â�Œ Deleted: 9a3aba324f7f_merge_organizations_and_pipeline_.py (obsolete merge)

**Simplified Migration Chain:**
```
c3a7b4bbf913 (rbac audit logs)
  â†“
dc2c0f69c1b1 (pipeline templates) â†� SINGLE HEAD âœ…
```

**Why This Works:**
- users.id is String(36) after migration `36b3e62b4148` âœ…
- organizations.id is String(36) from creation in `36b3e62b4148` âœ…
- Pipeline templates FK to users.id and organizations.id now safe âœ…

**Updated Migration:**
- dc2c0f69c1b1_add_pipeline_templates.py: Parent updated from `3a15202c7dc2` to `c3a7b4bbf913`

**Verification:**
- `alembic heads` shows single head: dc2c0f69c1b1 âœ…
- `alembic history` shows clean linear chain âœ…
- No circular dependencies âœ…
- No redundant type conversions âœ…

**Expected Deployment:**
When Render runs `alembic upgrade head` from state `8dcb6880a52b`:
1. Migrations 36b3e62b4148 â†’ c3a7b4bbf913 will run (including users.id conversion)
2. Migration dc2c0f69c1b1 (pipeline templates) will run with correct FK types
3. No type mismatch errors âœ…

**Additional Changes:**
- Valuation service improvements (backend/app/services/valuation_service.py)
- Valuation tests (backend/tests/test_valuation_service.py)
- Documentation updates (BMAD progress tracker, completion plans)
- Deal Kanban board enhancements (frontend)
- Migration strategy documentation (docs/migrations/UUID_CONVERSION_STRATEGY.md)

This resolves the 4 consecutive deployment failures.
